author: Henry St Leger
title: Small TV sales skyrocket as viewers stay indoors – but do you need one?
description: Sales of small TVs and second screens are the biggest beneficiary of today's increasingly isolated living situations.
content:
It's not a great time for most traditional retail businesses, with regular shoppers stuck indoors and non-essential shops closed to the public, but the shift towards indoors-living has seen a boom in sales of small TVs.
